link.title: Administrative Updates
link.script:

hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Third quarter report cards were sent out today.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to individual teachers and Cc (tyorke@sharonsprings.org)

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Students in grades 6 - 12 do not have the honor roll and/or merit roll designation on their report cards - the students who earned these designations will be honored in the Times Journal in several weeks as well as when we return to school.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: The food pantry located in the new "Visitor Entrance" will continue to be open on Tuesday and Friday from 7:30am- 9:00am and we are adding Wednesday from 6:00pm-7:00pm

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
p.span: Thanks to our dedicated, passionate and compassionate teachers, office staff, bus drivers, cafeteria staff and other SSCS family - students received learning materials today (or they're in the mail for our out-of-district students)!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: We also deeply appreciate the supportive community in which we serve!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: We miss our students, but love to see that despite not being in our building they are learning and overcoming challenges with resilience!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Please reach out to us if you need anything (tyorke@sharonsprings.org)

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: In these uncertain times you and our students can be certain that we care and will continue to do all we can to provide the support and resources they need to continue to learn.

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

h3.div: Despite the distance between us, we’re in this challenge together with you!

h3.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;
click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.strong: The language in Governor Cuomo’s executive order makes it clear that instruction must continue through this period.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: cademic participation during the closure is expected & not optional,
but that SSCS educators are here to support you through this each step of the way

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: Breakfast/lunch pickup/drop-off will next be conducted next on Tuesday 8:30am - 11am. If you are picking up, please pull up on the east-side by the "Food" sign, and ring the bell. If you are signed up, please make sure you are home for drop off (or pick up the food if you signed up to pick it up). We are on a Tuesday and Thursday breakfast/lunch pickup/drop-off.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: The community food bank, now located in the new "Visitor Entrance" area, is open to all Sharon springs residents Tuesday and Friday's 7:30am to 9:00am.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If your child needs to pick up materials at the school, please call the school (or email tyorke@sharonsprings.org) to arrange a specific time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If your child is not able to log into Schoology (or Google), please have him/her email Mr. Yorke at tyorke@sharonspring.org.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you picked up food or had it delivered today you do not need to complete another request. If you need breakfast/lunch but did not sign up yet, please click here. Please return food boxes/bags upon pickup or return them when the next delivery is made.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you work for an essential service provider, please use the "Child Care" tab to complete a survey so we can help in meeting your child care needs.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you need any materials, please call the school or email tyorke@sharonsprings.org to make arrangements to either have these materials picked up or delivered.

p.style: margin-left: 0; padding-left: 0; text-indent: 0;

li.p: If you are in need of any technical assistance please reach out to treynolds@sharonsprings.org. For Schoology assistance, reach out to tyorke@sharonsprings.org.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
